subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Robin Soderling has won his first match of the year, beating Florent Serra, 4-6, 6-4, 6-1, in the first round of the ABN Amro indoor tournament in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.
snippet: Robin Soderling has won his first match of the year, beating Florent Serra, 4-6, 6-4, 6-1, in the first round of the ABN Amro indoor tournament in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.
